text: Air Traffic Safety Electronics Personnel (ATSEPs) are the air traffic management technical staff in charge of the electronics and software used for the safety of air traffic. In France, ATSEPs are from the French Civil Aviation University, and in Morocco from the Acad√©mie internationale Mohammed VI de l'aviation civile. ==References== ==Other websites== *website page about ATSEPs * ATSEP Belgium Association webpage about the ATSEP *ATSEP Competence Category:Occupations in aviation Category:Aviation licenses and certifications Category:Air traffic control
title: Air Traffic Safety Electronics Personnel
